Container.Name: Tinyauth
Container.Overview: Tinyauth is an extremely simple Traefik forward auth proxy that adds a login screen to all of your apps that are using the Traefik reverse proxy. Tinyauth is configurable through environment variables and it is only 20MB in size.
Container.Category: Network:Proxy Security: Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: A 32 character long string used for the sessions.

Config.Name: Root URL
Config.Description: The base URL of your domain.

Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: The URL of the Tinyauth instance.

Config.Name: Users and Passwords
Config.Description: A comma-separated list of users names and their bcrypt hashed passwords, in pattern 'user:hashed_password'

Config.Name: Traefik - Rule
Config.Description: Traefik rule. Change based on your domain.

Config.Name: Traefik - Server Port
Config.Description: Server port for Tinyauth. Change as needed.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal server port. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Address
Config.Description: The internal address to bind to. Not recommended to change.
